title: Configure New CDN for Regional Expansion
description: A streaming service is expanding to a new region (e.g., Southeast Asia) and needs to configure a new CDN provider for that region.

tasks.description: Set up a new profile with the chosen CDN provider.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a new account and configuration profile with the CDN.

tasks.description: Configure the CDN to pull content from the primary storage location.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly sets the origin server address.

tasks.description: Update the main traffic management rules to direct users from Southeast Asia to the new CDN.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully adds the new routing rule.
